mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accounts (balance, type, opening_date, customer_id) VALUES (#{account.balance}, #{account.type}, #{account.openDate}, #{customerID})
mapper.update: UPDATE accounts SET balance = #{balance}, type = #{type}, opening_date = #{openDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.id AS account_id, a.type AS account_type, a.opening_date AS account_opening_date, a.balance AS account_balance, s.id AS statement_id, s.start_date AS statement_start_date, s.end_date AS statement_end_date, s.starting_balance AS statement_starting_balance, s.ending_balance AS statement_ending_balance FROM accounts a JOIN statements s ON a.id = s.account_id
